import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { bindActionCreators } from 'redux'; import {feetSingleProducts} from '../action/products'; class SingleProduct extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { singleItem : null } } componentWillMount() { const id = this.props.match.match.params.id; this.props.putIdTosaga(id); } prinStar = () =>{ let xhtml = ""; const numberstar = this.props.singleProductsFromStore.rate; for (let index = 0; index < numberstar - 1; index++) { xhtml += ; } return xhtml; } render() { const singleItem = this.props.singleProductsFromStore; return(

); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { singleProductsFromStore : state.singleProducts } } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { putIdTosaga: bindActionCreators(feetSingleProducts,dispatch) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(SingleProduct)
